thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start by listing the files in the current directory to see what we have available to work with.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files will give me an idea of what files I have available to work with and help me determine what my next steps should be.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory.
- Review the list of files to determine what files are available to work with.
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am reviewing the list of files carefully and not missing anything important.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to see what files are available in the current directory.
